posts.post_content:
All Cards SOLD.

I have changed collecting ideas, and am looking to sell some loose T205's. As the scans show, these are in decent shape. I would guess most will grade around a 2, but present well.

Gardner - $20 (no creases, paper loss on back)
Hanford Hassan - $25 (minor league)
Miller - $18 (very minor paperless on back)
Titus - $15 (paper loss on back)
Dunn Hassan - $30 (light vertical crease)
Murphy - $20
Schlei - $20
Hartsell - $18
Snodgrass - $23 (probably a 3 grade) (Honest LC)
Schulte - $20
Latham - $15
Knight - $20 (Sweet Cap)
Wolter - $20
Bell - $20 (Sweet Cap)
Hoffman - $20 (Sweet Cap)

Shipping is $3 per order, with tracking. Those who have dealt with me know I am a fast shipper, with very safe packaging. I will accept paypal or check. Prices are firm if buying individually, I am open to offers for multiples. I would accept $250 for the lot. Look for more from me this week.
